data.author: Carol Ann Duffy
data.quote: I grew up in a bookless house - my parents didn't read poetry, so if I hadn't had the chance to experience it at school I'd never have experienced it. But I loved English, and I was very lucky in that I had inspirational English teachers, Miss Scriven and Mr. Walker, and they liked us to learn poems by heart, which I found I loved doing.

data.author: Bessie Anderson Stanley
data.quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.

data.author: Myles Munroe
data.quote: You weren't born just to live a life and to die; you were born to accomplish something specifically. Matter of fact, success is making it to the end of your purpose; that is success... Success is not just existing. Success is making it to the end of why you were born.

data.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
data.quote: The supreme quality for leadership is unquestionably integrity. Without it, no real success is possible, no matter whether it is on a section gang, a football field, in an army, or in an office.

data.author: William Blake
data.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.

data.author: Adam Grant
data.quote: The culture of a workplace - an organization's values, norms and practices - has a huge impact on our happiness and success.

data.author: Phylicia Rashad
data.quote: Success for me means being able to work. I don't look at so much at what I've done as much as I look to what I will do.

data.author: Jerry West
data.quote: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me.

data.author: Salvador Dali
data.quote: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.

data.author: Bobby Unser
data.quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.

data.author: George Washington
data.quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.

data.author: Johnny Weir
data.quote: I'm different, and I have to be a warrior to be that way. But I have had some success; I hope I have touched the lives of some wonderful people, all by being what I see as myself but some others people see as different.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.

data.author: Andrew Stanton
data.quote: I'm still craving approval from my parents. It took a lot of success for me to realize it was never coming. It's just not in their nature.

data.author: Andrew Carnegie
data.quote: There is little success where there is little laughter.

data.author: Bob Feller
data.quote: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.

data.author: Arthur Helps
data.quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.

data.author: Andrew J. Bernstein
data.quote: The number of stressors has multiplied exponentially: traffic, money, success, work/life balance, the economy, the environment, parenting, family conflict, relationships, disease. As the nature of human life has become far more complicated, our ancient stress response hasn't been able to keep up.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
